text: And although you were dead in your offenses and sins,

<st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="4218" class="">formerly</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">lived</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2889">world’s</st> <st data-num="165" class="">present</st> path,<n id="3" /><st data-num="2596"> according to</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="758" class="">ruler</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1849">domain</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="109" class="">air</st>, <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> ruler of<n id="5" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st><n id="6" /> that is <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="1754" class="">energizing</st><n id="7" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="543" class="">disobedience</st>,<n id="8" />
among whom all of us also formerly lived out our lives in the cravings of our flesh, indulging the desires of the flesh and the mind, and were by nature children of wrath even as the rest…
But God, being rich in mercy because of his great love with which he loved us,

<st data-num="2532">even</st> though <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> in <st data-num="3900">offenses</st>, <st data-num="4806" class="">made</st> us <st data-num="4806">alive together with</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>—by <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>!<n id="1" />—

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="4891" class="">raised</st> us <st data-num="4891" class="">up together with</st> him <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4776" class="">seated</st> us <st data-num="4776">together with</st> him <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2032">heavenly realms</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>,

<st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1731" class="">demonstrate</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1904" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="165" class="">ages</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5235" class="">surpassing</st> <st data-num="4149" class="">wealth</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5544" class="">kindness</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">toward</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> by <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">yourselves</st>, it is the <st data-num="1435" class="">gift</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st>;

it is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> can <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st>.<n id="2" />
For we are his creative work, having been created in Christ Jesus for good works that God prepared beforehand so we can do them.
Therefore remember that formerly you, the Gentiles in the flesh—who are called “uncircumcision” by the so-called “circumcision” that is performed on the body by human hands—

<st data-num="3754">that</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> at <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st> <st data-num="5565" class="">without</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Messiah</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="526" class="">alienated</st> from the <st data-num="4174" class="">citizenship</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3581" class="">strangers</st> to the <st data-num="1242" class="">covenants</st> of <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">having</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="112">without God</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3570" class="">now</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> who <st data-num="4218" class="">used</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3112">far away</st> have been <st data-num="1096" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st>, the one who <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> <st data-num="297" class="">both</st> groups into <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> who <st data-num="3089" class="">destroyed</st> the <st data-num="3320">middle wall of partition</st>, the <st data-num="2189">hostility</st>,

when he <st data-num="2673" class="">nullified</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of <st data-num="1785" class="">commandments</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1378" class="">decrees</st>. He did this <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2936" class="">create</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st><n id="2" /> out of <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st>,<n id="3" /> thus <st data-num="4160" class="">making</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="604" class="">reconcile</st> them <st data-num="297" class="">both</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="4716" class="">cross</st>, <st data-num="1722">by</st> <st data-num="846">which</st> the <st data-num="2189" class="">hostility</st> has been <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="2097" class="">preached</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> who were <st data-num="3112" class="">far off</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> to those who were <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st>,

<st data-num="3754">so that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> we <st data-num="297" class="">both</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4318" class="">access</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>.

<st data-num="686" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3765" class="">no longer</st> <st data-num="3581" class="">foreigners</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3941" class="">noncitizens</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4847">fellow citizens</st> with the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3609">members of</st> God’s <st data-num="3609" class="">household</st>,

because you have been <st data-num="2026">built</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2310" class="">foundation</st> of the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>,<n id="2" /> with <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> as<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="204" class="">cornerstone</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3619" class="">building</st>,<n id="2" /> being <st data-num="4883">joined together</st>, <st data-num="837" class="">grows</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> a <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>,
in whom you also are being built together into a dwelling place of God in the Spirit.
